scripts.build: cp ./node_modules/higlass/dist/scripts/hglib.js ./docs/hglib.js; cp ./node_modules/higlass/dist/styles/hglib.css ./docs/hglib.css; cp ./node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.css ./docs/bootstrap.css; cp ./node_modules/pixi.js/dist/pixi.min.js ./docs/pixi.js; cp ./node_modules/react/dist/react.js ./docs/react.js; cp ./node_modules/react/dist/react.min.js ./docs/react.js; cp ./node_modules/react-bootstrap/dist/react-bootstrap.min.js ./docs/react-bootstrap.js; cp ./node_modules/react-dom/dist/react-dom.min.js ./docs/react-dom.js
